title: Meatloaf
ingredients: ['For the Meatloaf', '750g minced beef', '1 (40g) packet French onion soup mix', '2 eggs', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '1 teaspoon soy sauce', 'For the Sauce', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoon mustard powder', '1 1/2 teaspoon curry powder', '1 teaspoon oil', '3 tablespoons plum jam']
